resources.string: Don’t get bored with writing lesson plans anymore! Get your lessons for every week right now!

• We do not claim ownership of any GES materials 
 • Do not forget to check freebies for free contents. 
 
• Please do not cancel payment until you receive transaction notice or success message in the app. 
 
•Click on App Guide to watch videos on how to use the app.
click To Refresh or swipe down
click on step two which will avail two options to you 1. Download 2. Read

** • NOTE in case of no pending approvals shown in your MOMO wallet, please try checking for approvals again after at least 25 seconds. 
 
 After confirming payment in your approvals please do not close the app kindly go back to the Payment page in the app to verify your payment status and access to your paid content. •
 
 please do not close or cancel payment after approving payment in wallet, wait to get verified. 
 
 • Contact admin in case of any issue

•Option 7 is now option 6 in MoMO \n \n• In case of no pending approvals is shown in your MOMO wallet, please wait and try checking for approvals again after at least 25 seconds.• please do not close the app kindly go back to the Payment page in the app to verify your payment status
Please your download folder is empty download to view files here NB Files with password can only be viewed with the app
Click Here if u are experiencing login problem
Enter your email to recover or change your password ?
Click here for your ASOL & TSOL

Please return to the payment page after confirming the transaction by dialing *389*89# and wait until you see a success message. Please also ensure that you have enough balance in your wallet before performing transactions.
Never get bored writing notes ever !
